Html:
Hi,

First of all I want to say that you did a great job, i"m working with your control for a few months now and it is very intuitive.

 

I"m using WPF version,

Now i"m facing a problem, i"m drawing a route using Route collection, actually I making a lot of them in a time,

I want to set some of them to be invisible from time to time, How do I make it?

 

Thanks
hey! ..a route is just a generated shape, sou you can set it's visibility easily: route.Shape.IsVisible = false;
